Primitives Circuit Components¶

class pyaedt.modeler.PrimitivesNexxim.NexximComponents(parent, modeler)[source]¶

Class for management of all CircuitComponents for Nexxim

add_subcircuit_hfss_link(compName, pin_names, source_project_path, source_project_name, source_design_name, solution_name='Setup1 : Sweep')[source]¶
Parameters

  • compName -- param pin_names:

  • source_project_path -- param source_project_name:

  • source_design_name -- param solution_name:

  • pin_names --

  • source_project_name --

  • solution_name -- (Default value = "Setup1 : Sweep")

assign_sin_excitation2ports(ports, settings)[source]¶
Parameters

  • ports -- List of circuit ports for excitation assignation

  • settings -- List of parameters values used in voltage sinusoidal excitation creation:

  • settings -- 0]: AC magnitude for small-signal analysis

  • settings -- 1]: AC phase for small-signal analysis

  • settings -- 2]: DC voltage

  • settings -- 3]: Voltage offset from zero

  • settings -- 4]: Voltage amplitude

  • settings -- 5]: Frequency

  • settings -- 6]: Delay to start of sine wave

  • settings -- 7]: Damping factor

  • settings -- 8]: Phase Delay

  • settings -- 9]: Frequency to use for harmonic balance analysis

Parameters

sourcename -- name of the source design

Returns

el, composed_name if succeeded or False

create_component(inst_name=None, component_library='Resistors', component_name='RES_', xpos=0.1, ypos=0.1, angle=0, use_instance_id_netlist=False, global_netlist_list=[])[source]¶

Create new component from Library

Parameters

  • inst_name -- Instance Name (Default value = None)

  • component_library -- Component Library (Default Resistors)

  • component_name -- Component name in library Default RES

  • xpos -- x position (Default value = 0.1)

  • ypos -- y position (Default value = 0.1)

  • angle -- component angle (Default value = 0)

  • use_instance_id_netlist -- bool to enable instance id in netlist (Default value = False)

  • global_netlist_list -- (Default value = [])

Returns

id , composed_name

Return type

type
